directions: Remove the skin, then brush on oil and grind on some black pepper. Simply grill, broil, microwave or bake the fish until desired doneness. Combine salsa ingredients. Serve fish with a big dollop of fruit salsa.
Heat oil in a very large skillet. Add garlic; saute. Add spinach in batches. Stir until just wilted.
ingredients: 2 pounds fresh spinach, preferably organic, well washed and drained
title: Salmon With Fruit Salsa by Jean Carper
